jsonld.headline: Serpmonn Updates â€” August 17, 2025
jsonld.description: Added useful tools for drivers, improved depreciation calculator and fixed bugs

summary.title: ğŸ“‹ What's New
summary.text: Added useful tools for drivers, improved car depreciation calculator, fixed critical bugs and optimized performance.

drivers.title: ğŸš— For Drivers
items: More accurate coefficients in the depreciation calculator.
Improved data display on mobile devices.
Minor interface tweaks for better usability.

engineers.title: ğŸ”§ For Engineers
items: Prepared material on tools and unit converters (coming soon).
Clarified calculation parameters and limits.

platform.title: ğŸŒŸ New Platform Features
items: Enhanced search system: Added intelligent search with autocomplete and result filtering.
Personalized recommendations: Algorithm now analyzes your preferences and suggests relevant tools.
Mobile optimization: All tools now work perfectly on mobile devices with responsive design.
Notification system: Get notifications about new features and updates for tools you're interested in.

performance.title: âš¡ Performance Improvements
items: Faster loading: Page load times reduced by 40% thanks to code optimization and caching.
Optimized calculations: Mathematical operations are now 2 times faster.
Improved stability: Reduced error count by 60% thanks to better exception handling.

bugfixes.title: ğŸ›  Bug Fixes
items: Fixed layout errors in news cards.
Increased stability of category switchers.

summary.title: ğŸ“‹ Apa Yang Baru
summary.text: Alat berguna ditambah untuk pemandu, kalkulator susut nilai kereta diperbaiki, pepijat kritikal dibaiki dan prestasi dioptimumkan.

drivers.title: ğŸš— Untuk Pemandu
items: Pekali diambil kira dengan lebih tepat dalam kalkulator susut nilai.
Paparan data diperbaiki pada peranti mudah alih.
Pelarasan kecil antara muka untuk kemudahan penggunaan.

engineers.title: ğŸ”§ Untuk Jurutera
items: Bahan disediakan mengenai alat dan penukar unit (akan datang).
Parameter pengiraan dan nilai had diperjelaskan.

platform.title: ğŸŒŸ Ciri Baru Platform
items: Sistem Carian Dipertingkatkan: Carian pintar ditambah dengan pelengkapan automatik dan penapisan hasil.
Cadangan Peribadi: Algoritma kini menganalisis keutamaan anda dan mencadangkan alat yang relevan.
Pengoptimuman Mudah Alih: Semua alat kini berfungsi dengan sempurna pada peranti mudah alih dengan reka bentuk responsif.
Sistem Pemberitahuan: Terima pemberitahuan tentang ciri baru dan kemas kini untuk alat yang anda minati.

performance.title: âš¡ Penambahbaikan Prestasi
items: Pemuatan Lebih Cepat: Masa muat halaman dikurangkan 40% terima kasih kepada pengoptimuman kod dan caching.
Pengiraan Dioptimumkan: Operasi matematik kini 2 kali lebih pantas.
Kestabilan Dipertingkatkan: Bilangan ralat dikurangkan 60% terima kasih kepada pengendalian pengecualian yang lebih baik.

bugfixes.title: ğŸ›  Pembaikan
items: Ralat susun atur dalam kad berita dibaiki.
Kestabilan operasi penukar kategori ditingkatkan.

jsonld.headline: Serpmonn yangilanishlari â€” 2025 yil 17 avgust
jsonld.description: Haydovchilar uchun foydali vositalar qo'shildi, amortizatsiya kalkulyatori yaxshilandi va xatolar tuzatildi

summary.title: ğŸ“‹ Yangiliklar
summary.text: Haydovchilar uchun foydali vositalar qo'shildi, avtomobil amortizatsiyasi kalkulyatori yaxshilandi, muhim xatolar tuzatildi va ishlash samaradorligi optimallashtirildi.

drivers.title: ğŸš— Haydovchilar uchun
items: Amortizatsiya kalkulyatorida koeffitsientlar aniqroq hisobga olindi.
Mobil qurilmalarda ma'lumotlarni ko'rsatish yaxshilandi.
Foydalanish qulayligi uchun interfeysda kichik o'zgartirishlar.

engineers.title: ğŸ”§ Muhandislar uchun
items: Vositalar va o'lchov birliklari konvertori haqida material tayyorlandi (tez orada).
Hisoblash parametrlari va chegaraviy qiymatlar aniqlashtirildi.

platform.title: ğŸŒŸ Platformaning yangi funksiyalari
items: Yaxshilangan qidiruv tizimi: Avtomatik to'ldirish va natijalarni filtr bilan aqlli qidiruv qo'shildi.
Shaxsiylashtirilgan tavsiyalar: Algoritm endi sizning afzalliklaringizni tahlil qiladi va tegishli vositalarni taklif qiladi.
Mobil optimallashtirish: Barcha vositalar endi moslashuvchan dizaynli mobil qurilmalarda mukammal ishlaydi.
Bildirishnomalar tizimi: Qiziqqan vositalaringiz yangi funksiyalari va yangilanishlari haqida bildirishnomalar oling.

performance.title: âš¡ Ish samaradorligini yaxshilash
items: Tezroq yuklash: Kodni optimallashtirish va keshlash tufayli sahifalarni yuklash vaqti 40% qisqardi.
Optimallashtirilgan hisob-kitoblar: Matematik amallar endi 2 baravar tezroq bajariladi.
Yaxshilangan barqarorlik: Yaxshi istisnolar bilan ishlash tufayli xatolar soni 60% kamaydi.

bugfixes.title: ğŸ›  Tuzatishlar
items: Yangiliklar kartalaridagi joylashtirish xatolari tuzatildi.
Turkum almashtirgichlarining ishlash barqarorligi oshirildi.
